feed.title: PostHog Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for PostHog: posthog-cli-v0.0.6
entry.content:
Install posthog-cli 0.0.6

Install prebuilt binaries via shell script

sh curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -LsSf https://github.com/PostHog/posthog/releases/download/posthog-cli-v0.0.6/posthog-cli-installer.sh | sh

Install prebuilt binaries via powershell script

sh powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -c "irm https://github.com/PostHog/posthog/releases/download/posthog-cli-v0.0.6/posthog-cli-installer.ps1 | iex"

Download posthog-cli 0.0.6

| File | Platform | Checksum | |--------|----------|----------| | posthog-cli-aarch64-apple-darwin.tar.xz | Apple Silicon macOS | checksum | | posthog-cli-x86_64-apple-darwin.tar.xz | Intel macOS | checksum | | posthog-cli-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc.zip | x64 Windows | checksum | | posthog-cli-aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.xz | ARM64 Linux | checksum | | posthog-cli-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.xz | x64 Linux | checksum | | posthog-cli-x86_64-unknown-linux-musl.tar.xz | x64 MUSL Linux | checksum |

entry.title: New release for PostHog: posthog-cli-v0.0.7
entry.content:
Install posthog-cli 0.0.7

Install prebuilt binaries via shell script

sh curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -LsSf https://github.com/PostHog/posthog/releases/download/posthog-cli-v0.0.7/posthog-cli-installer.sh | sh

Install prebuilt binaries via powershell script

sh powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -c "irm https://github.com/PostHog/posthog/releases/download/posthog-cli-v0.0.7/posthog-cli-installer.ps1 | iex"

Install prebuilt binaries into your npm project

sh npm install @posthog/cli@0.0.7

Download posthog-cli 0.0.7
